nodes.text: The Flarestar system, also known as the Aridus system, was a star system located in the Narvath sector of the galaxy's Expansion Region. It was located along the Gamor Run and contained Flarestar, a star orbited by the planet Aridus, homeworld of the Chubbit species.

The Flarestar system was originally created for the Star Wars Legends reference book The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons, written by Daniel Wallace, edited by Sue Rostoni and Steve Saffel, and illustrated by Brandon McKinney and Scott Kolins and released on July 21, 1998. The Essential Atlas, a Legends reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, identified it as the Aridus system and placed it in grid square O-14.
